text: Luis Alberto Suárez Díaz (; born 24 January 1987) is a Uruguayan professional footballer who plays for Major League Soccer club Inter Miami CF and the Uruguay national team. His brother Paulo Suárez is also a professional footballer. Suarez has scored the most goals for the Uruguay national football team. Suarez has caused controversy with his biting incidents, such as when he bit Giorgio Chiellini during their 2014 FIFA World Cup match against Italy. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and
